{{Location Intro|The '''Children of Echoes Bulletin Board'''|description=It is located next to [[Stage Tepetl (Point of Interest)|Stage Tepetl]].<p>The messages randomly cycle through every time it is interacted with.</p>}}

==Content==
{{Dialogue Start}}
===Introduction===
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Welcome, guest from afar. Whatever light you come seeking, the [[Children of Echoes]] will respond with sincerity as solid and steady as the stones and as hot as the fires of the forge."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "In accordance with Chief [[Pacal]]'s decree, all tribal matters will be announced here. (Note: Remember to tear down the old notices soon!)"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Points of Interest===
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "To guests from afar (Note: Remember not to tear this down again!) &mdash; This is known as the [[Stage Tepetl (Point of Interest)|Stage Tepetl]], and is where we usually hold dance competitions."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "If that interests you, why not hop on stage and dance with us?"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "In addition, just over the bridge is [[Muhuru's Gemporium]]. If you want to purchase any gemstone accessories, there's no better place!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "For large-scale ore and mineral trading: Take a right and head along the stairs. Negotiate directly with Chief Pacal."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "On the other side of the steps is the [[Apoxpalon|Macuahuitl Workshop]]. If you need some seriously sturdy tools or weapons, you can't go wrong with them! Chief-approved!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Finally, whatever light you come seeking, the Children of Echoes will respond with sincerity as solid and steady as the stones and as hot as the fires of the forge. May your path shine brighter than gemstones."
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Mining Teams===
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "The Children of Echoes has 19 mining teams, of which 12 have fixed tasks within the tribe, 7 teams are available to be hired for mining or excavation tasks outside the tribe..."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "If you are interested in hiring a mining team, please prepare all the necessary documents before discussing the matter with Chief Pacal."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "We don't really like handling documents, and aren't too fussed with the details of various commercial terms. We trust that you aren't going to be too petty, play dirty, or try to take advantage of us."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Otherwise, we'll see you at [[Chasca]]'s mediation table. Deals that end in discord are no good for anyone!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Drillbit Dance-Off===
:'''Drillbit Dance Dance-Off:''' "The results of the 127751st Drillbit Dance daily dance-off have been announced! [[Itzna]] has won the crown, marking her 200th win in the daily dance-off!"
:'''Drillbit Dance Dance-Off:''' "Children of Echoes, {{sic|let}} hear you make some noise! The next time we see Itzna, lift her onto your shoulders, throw her into the sky, and celebrate her success!"
:'''Drillbit Dance Dance-Off:''' "In addition, [[Zacatula]] and [[Tlaco]] have now participated in the competition for 1200 and 1700 total days respectively! Give it up for our two old friends!"
:'''Drillbit Dance Dance-Off:''' "And as for you youngsters watching the dancers from offstage, how can you still stay still?"
:'''Drillbit Dance Dance-Off:''' "Get up on the stage, and dance, dance, dance! Become a member of the Drillbit Dance! Show us your courage and resolve, and you can also become a legend of the stage!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Graffiti Alliance Announcement===
:'''Graffiti Alliance Announcement:''' "Smash it all!"
:'''Graffiti Alliance Announcement:''' "Smash unchanging scenery, smash ordinary, dull colors, smash the regular, ordered life that lulls you into complacency and puts you to sleep!"
:'''Graffiti Alliance Announcement:''' "Pick up your spray cans, and fill every flat wall, cliff face, and rock wall with the fruits of your imagination! The [[Graffiti Alliance]] is ready and waiting for you to join!"
:'''Graffiti Alliance Announcement:''' "If you're interested in graffiti, drop by the [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] to register and join at any time! Find your crew, grab your gear, and let's go go go!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Pilgrimage Announcement===
''Available before completing the {{Quest|Past and Future}}.''
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Super great news! The next [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] is starting soon, and many of our young warriors will represent our tribe in the war!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "Participants include: The popular "Drillbit Dancer" Itzna, the veteran Tlaco, the biggest bro of the miner bros [[Kwila]], our god of cooking [[Cempoa]]..."
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "In addition, everyone's eyes will be on the renowned legendary contestant, the 'Sand Dagger of Seit'aad' [[Amuru]] as he embarks on another journey!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "And his old rival, the 'Calamity of Tetlahuitl' [[Nkunga]] has sharpened his axe and is hot on his heels!"
:'''Tribal Announcement:''' "And that's not even close to all &mdash; another familiar face, the holder of an [[Ancient Name]], [[Kachina]], will also take part once more! We hope she'll do great this time! We hope everyone will cheer them on with all you've got!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)
{{Dialogue End}}
